Name: Mummy Rumble VR
About the game: Mummy Rumble VR lets you choose what you want to play in a sandbox style. Collecting mummy heads in creative ways to gain new weaponry filled with different perks. Trick your enemies by trapping them in the pit of doom but make sure not to trap yourself !
